objects.text:

• Rose Gold Plated
• Perfect Gift Design
• 6 Month Warranty

Gift Her a Touch
of Glamour!

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

banner_details:
This banner features a feminine and elegant aesthetic designed to promote a pair of rose gold stud earrings. The layout is split into two soft color sections — the top in a lighter pink and the bottom in a slightly deeper blush tone. The bold heading (`heading`) at the top uses a deep mauve tone to attract attention, followed by a graceful serif subheading (`subheading`) introducing the product category.

To the left below the subheading is a bullet list (`description`) highlighting key product features in a smaller font. Centered prominently are product images (`product_image`) displaying the stud earrings. The bottom section includes a promotional tagline (`tagline`) in a stylish serif font, followed by a bold display of the price (`price`) and a noticeable call-to-action (`cta`) inside a rounded rectangle button (`cta_background`).

Wavy accents and soft transparencies in the background lend a delicate and stylish visual texture, enhancing the luxurious feel of the product.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Pink: `#FFF5F5`
- Blush Pink: `#FFF0F0`
- Rose Tone: `#FCE4E4`
- Accent Rose: `#F8D0D0`
- Deep Mauve (Text and Button): `#AB5C6B`
- Light Mauve (Subtext): `#C17F8C`
- Dark Plum (Features Text): `#744E58`
- White (Button Text): `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings with a delicate blend of rose gold and crystal white tones. The primary color is a soft rose gold (#F4A6A1), creating a warm and luxurious base. Sparkling clear gemstones with white and silver reflections (#FFFFFF and #E1E1E1) enhance the elegance and contrast against the rose gold. A soft blush pink (#FDC5C0) adds a feminine touch within the teardrop-shaped petal detail. The colors are skillfully blended, with the rose gold framework encircling and highlighting the shimmer of the crystals. This balanced palette makes the earrings look both sophisticated and eye-catching.
